unknown.detailed: An unexpected error occurred. Check the logs if the problem persists.

internal.detailed: An internal error occurred in GigaMind. Please submit a bug report.

api_invalid_key.medium: The API key is invalid. Please check your settings.
api_invalid_key.detailed: The Anthropic API key is invalid. Use 'gigamind config' to reset your API key or check the ANTHROPIC_API_KEY environment variable.

api_rate_limit.medium: API request limit reached. Please try again in a moment.
api_rate_limit.detailed: Anthropic API rate limit reached. Wait about 1 minute and try again. Consider upgrading your API plan for sustained usage.

api_quota_exceeded.detailed: API usage quota has been exceeded. Check your usage in the Anthropic console and upgrade your plan.

api_network_error.medium: Network connection problem. Check your internet connection.
api_network_error.detailed: Cannot connect to the API server. Check your internet connection, firewall settings, and proxy configuration.

api_timeout.medium: Request timed out. Please try again.
api_timeout.detailed: API request timed out. Check your network status and try breaking the request into smaller parts.

api_server_error.medium: API server issue. Please try again later.
api_server_error.detailed: An error occurred on the Anthropic API server. Check status.anthropic.com for service status.

api_model_unavailable.medium: The requested AI model is not available.
api_model_unavailable.detailed: The specified AI model cannot be used. Select a different model in settings or try again later.

api_context_too_long.medium: Input is too long. Please shorten your content.
api_context_too_long.detailed: The conversation context exceeds the model's maximum token limit. Start a new session or reduce your input.

api_authentication_failed.detailed: API authentication failed. Verify that your API key is correctly configured.

validation_required_field.detailed: A required input field is missing. Please fill in all required fields.

validation_invalid_format.detailed: The input value format is invalid. Please enter in the correct format.

validation_invalid_path.detailed: The specified file or directory path is not valid. Please check the path.

validation_invalid_config.detailed: The configuration file contains invalid values. Please check and correct your settings.

validation_tool_input.medium: Invalid input passed to the tool.
validation_tool_input.detailed: Invalid input value passed to the subagent tool.

fs_file_not_found.detailed: The specified file does not exist. Please check the file path.

fs_permission_denied.medium: No permission to access the file.
fs_permission_denied.detailed: No permission to access the file or directory. Check file permissions or run with administrator privileges.

fs_no_space.detailed: No space left on disk. Delete unnecessary files to free up space.

fs_path_too_long.detailed: File path exceeds system limits. Use a shorter path.

fs_directory_not_found.detailed: The specified directory does not exist. Please check the directory path.

fs_file_exists.medium: A file with the same name already exists.
fs_file_exists.detailed: A file with the same name already exists. Use a different name or delete the existing file.

fs_read_error.detailed: An error occurred while reading the file. The file may be corrupted or in use by another program.

fs_write_error.detailed: An error occurred while saving the file. Check disk space and write permissions.

fs_access_denied.medium: Attempted to access a restricted path.
fs_access_denied.detailed: Access outside the notes directory is not allowed for security reasons.

config_not_found.detailed: GigaMind configuration file not found. Run 'gigamind config' to set up initial configuration.

config_parse_error.detailed: The configuration file (config.yaml) format is invalid. Check the YAML syntax.

config_invalid_value.detailed: The configuration file contains invalid values. Please check and correct your settings.

config_missing_api_key.detailed: Anthropic API key is required. Run 'gigamind config' or set the ANTHROPIC_API_KEY environment variable.

config_notes_dir_not_found.detailed: The configured notes directory does not exist. Run 'gigamind config' to set the correct path.

subagent_unknown.detailed: Unknown subagent. Available agents: search-agent, note-agent, clone-agent

subagent_execution_failed.medium: An error occurred during agent execution.
subagent_execution_failed.detailed: An error occurred during subagent execution. Check the logs or try again.

subagent_timeout.detailed: Subagent task exceeded the time limit. Try breaking the request into smaller parts.

subagent_tool_failed.detailed: An error occurred with a tool used by the subagent.

subagent_max_iterations.detailed: Subagent reached the maximum iteration count. Please make your request more specific.

subagent_not_initialized.detailed: Subagent has not been initialized. Please verify that the API key is configured.

recovery_hints.api_invalid_key: Run gigamind config to reset your API key.
recovery_hints.api_rate_limit: Wait about 1 minute and try again.
recovery_hints.api_quota_exceeded: Upgrade your plan in the Anthropic console.
recovery_hints.api_timeout: Try breaking your request into smaller parts.
recovery_hints.api_context_too_long: Start a new session or clear the conversation.
recovery_hints.fs_permission_denied: Check file permissions or run with administrator privileges.
recovery_hints.config_missing_api_key: Run gigamind config to set your API key.
recovery_hints.config_notes_dir_not_found: Run gigamind config to reset your notes folder.
recovery_hints.subagent_max_iterations: Try making your request more specific.

api_key_invalid.title: Invalid API key.
api_key_invalid.check_console: Verify your API key at https://console.anthropic.com
api_key_invalid.full_message:
Invalid API key.

Solution:
- Check your settings with /config
- Verify your API key at https://console.anthropic.com

authentication_failed.title: Authentication failed.
authentication_failed.check_api_key: Verify your API key is correct
authentication_failed.check_expiry: Check if your API key has expired
authentication_failed.full_message:
Authentication failed.

Solution:
- Verify your API key is correct
- Check if your API key has expired

rate_limit.title: Too many requests.
rate_limit.wait_and_retry: Please wait a moment and try again (about 1 minute)
rate_limit.full_message:
Too many requests.

Solution:
- Please wait a moment and try again (about 1 minute)

quota_exceeded.title: API usage quota exceeded.
quota_exceeded.upgrade_plan: Consider upgrading your plan if needed
quota_exceeded.full_message:
API usage quota exceeded.

Solution:
- Check your usage at https://console.anthropic.com
- Consider upgrading your plan if needed

network_error.title: Network connection problem.
network_error.full_message:
Network connection problem.

Solution:
- Check your internet connection
- Verify VPN or proxy settings

timeout.title: Request timed out.
timeout.retry_later: Please try again in a moment
timeout.full_message:
Request timed out.

Solution:
- Check your network connection
- Please try again in a moment

server_error.title: Server is experiencing temporary issues.
server_error.retry_later: Please try again in a moment
server_error.check_status: If the problem persists, check https://status.anthropic.com
server_error.full_message:
Server is experiencing temporary issues.

Solution:
- Please try again in a moment
- If the problem persists, check https://status.anthropic.com

generic.title: An error occurred
generic.solution_hint: If the problem persists, check your settings or restart the app.
generic.full_message:
An error occurred: {{message}}

If the problem persists, check your settings or restart the app.

validation.invalid_api_key_format: Invalid Anthropic API key format (must start with sk-ant-)

clone.error_during_clone: An error occurred during clone mode: {{error}}

note.error_during_note: An error occurred while writing note: {{error}}
note.error_during_note_friendly: There was a problem writing the note.

graph.error_starting_server: An error occurred while starting the graph server: {{error}}

config.save_error: An error occurred while saving settings: {{error}}
